Stinkbomb/Ramhorn:

::Stinkbomb waited for a moment, no one coming::
"Slagging piles of -s" he was interrupted by Liono's 'interesting' com 
message, smiling.
<Liono,> he said, turning his back to Ramhorn, <Yo-AGH!  UGGGGH!!! AGH!> the 
com message ending, Stinkbomb falling to his knees, Ramhorn kicking him to 
the ground, a knife in Stinkbomb's back::

"Slag!" ::he yelled, as Stinkbomb quickly rose up, stabbing with his tail, 
the tail slashing across Ramhorn's chest, the rhino running forward and 
uppercutting Stinkbomb into some controls, then kneeing him the cut, followed 
up by a right hook, Stinkbomb returning the hits with a knee to the right 
knee, then a stab with his tail into Ramhorn's left arm, then a backhand sent 
Ramhorn to the ground::
